name: Savage Deserts
description:
Savage Deserts is a fun and challenging top down shooter set place in a desert far far away, hidden from the eyes of travelers and adventurers. but one day a Strange rift opens in the middle of this desert and with it come thousands of monsters. but you are here to save us all!... i mean .. you should be... 

you are gonna save us right?

Fight thousands of monsters with their own flesh and defeat the almighty hole!

!Important note!: if you leave the tutorial without reaching the part where you can move you wont be able to move in the main game (i cant fix it since the voting time has come ;¯\_(ツ)_/¯ )

the game should run on the Kenney Mini Font. if it doesn't, you can download the font from the original page or download it from the project files

How to play :
  • WASD : Movement
  • LMB : Shoot
  • RMB : Throw grenade (when ready)
  • TAB : Toggle UI (permanent / Dynamic)
Important Rules :
  • You die if you touch the hole
  • you can make the hole shrink a bit by shooting it
  • You use the Meat dropped by your enemies as ammunition (ammo conservation can be a problem in the early game)
  • You get access to your grenade every 10 kills, use RMB to throw it. the grenade will shrink the hole a lot
  • Grenade throws will also cause a bullet burst which will NOT use ammunition
  • You can get rid of the hole, but its not that easy
  • Important Note: this game has a lot of shooting, which means you have to hold down your LMB a lot. if you run into any troubles with your finger or get tired after a while there is an option in the options menu which will make the game shoot for you. ammo wont be that big of a deal(you will still use ammo)
  • You can make the game fullscreen with a checkbox in the options

this game was made for the Brackeys 2020 Game jam
